channel.title: News on Gardener
channel.description: Recent content in News on Gardener

item.title: Gardener Website 2.0
item.description: .lity-content .news-item { background: #fff; padding: 30px 20px; } .news-item .green-power { color: #0f674e; font-weight: 700; } .news-item .green-power img { width: 32px; vertical-align: middle; margin-right: 5px; } @media (min-width: 750px) { .news-item .green-power img { width: 48px; } } .news-item .title-2 { font-weight: 700; } New Website, Same Green Power! The Gardener Project just got a brand new website with multiple improvements and we are all very excited!

item.title: Gardener 1.3.0 Released
item.description: Gardener 1.3.0 Released See what’s new and noteworthy presented by the team on the regular community meeting recording. Bookmark the agenda for upcomming community meetings and stay up to date with what’s going on in the project. Enjoy!
